Package org.wmn4j.mir

Class PatternPosition

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.mir.PatternPosition
public final class PatternPosition extends Object
Represents the position of a Pattern in a Score. This class is immutable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new pattern position with the given positions.

      Creates a new pattern position with the given positions.

  • Method Details

    • getFrom

      public Pattern getFrom(Score score)
      Returns the pattern specified by this pattern position in the given score.

      The returned pattern contains a voice for each staff that the pattern position refers to. If the pattern position refers to a staff that has multiple voices and any of the notes referred to by the pattern overlap, then separate pattern voices are created for each of the voices within the staff.

      The pattern contains only those notes that are included in the pattern specified by the position, the intermediate notes are replaced by padding rests.

      Parameters:
      score - the score from which the get the pattern specified by this pattern position
      Returns:
      the pattern specified by the this pattern position in the given score
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if this pattern position refers to a note outside the score

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of notation elements the referred pattern contains.
      Returns:
      the number of notation elements the referred pattern contains

      public boolean contains(Position position)

      Parameters:
